mapper.select: select ( CASE WHEN code = '1' THEN '출장' WHEN code = '2' THEN '미팅' WHEN code = '3' THEN '교육' WHEN code = '4' THEN '외근' ELSE '미기입' end )AS title, date_trunc('minute', start_dt) as start, date_trunc('minute', end_dt) as end, color, allday, url from hr_003_1 WHERE user_id = #{id} AND reg_dt BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2019-12-31'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_003_1 VALUES( #{id}, to_timestamp(#{a} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_timestamp(#{b} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{color}, #{allDay}, #{url}, #{title}, #{sType}, now() )
